::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod munched on a energon cube, whene he noticed he was out of
energin. He had already decided to get drunk, so he got a refill, and
sat back down.
"So, what about you?"

::K-9::

K-9 locked on Cave-in, and opened fire.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit heard KitKat call out. He didn't know what to do. His love was
going insane, and he could do nothing, but watch.
